q1: I really love the team France
q2: "La France" redirects here. For other uses of "La France", see Lafrance (disambiguation). For other uses of "France", see France (disambiguation).
q3: Do you recall who France played in their first match?
a3: For the world cup France's first match was Australia.
a4: Paul Pogba is France's best defender

a5: Hugo Lloris is their number 1 keeper.
